comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: He had a cup of coffee in the bigs: www.baseball-reference.com/players/e/escheji01.shtml Apparently played most of his career for the Paterson (NJ) Silk Sox (not to be confused with a soccer team of the same name): research.sabr.org/journals/silk-sox-saga And he has a stub Wikipedia page: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Eschen
